title: S3cco
author: S3cco
content: CaesarVerse Toga Party at 3XP Gaming Convention | 8 June 2023 | Los Angeles, USAEvent Website: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/3xp-toga-after-party-presented...Get ready to party like it's Ancient Rome at our Toga Party, brought to you by the creators of CaesarVerse.Dress in your best toga (or don't, we won't judge) and enjoy delicious food and drinks as you mingle with fellow gamers and industry professionals.Do you want to feel like an Emperor for a night? Join VIP Toga-holders to rule your own kingdom. VIP Toga-holders receive an exclusive CaesarVerse Gladiator figurine, a golden chalice, and free drinks for the whole evening.

comments.author: S3cco
comments.body: CaesarVerse.io Presents Toga Party at 3XP Gaming Convention in Los Angeles https://bitcoingarden.org/caesarverse-io-presents-toga-party-at-3xp-gaming-convention-in-los-angeles/ The Toga Party, presented by CaesarVerse.io, will be held at The Romanesque Room on June 8 from 7.30 pm. Attendees can look forward to an electrifying atmosphere, complete with captivating decorations inspired by the grandeur of ancient Rome. Partygoers are encouraged to dress in their finest togas, embracing the theme of the event and adding to the excitement and authenticity of the experience.This exclusive after-party will bring together gaming enthusiasts, industry professionals, and influencers for an evening of celebration. Guests will have the opportunity to engage with the innovative CaesarVerse.io game, a ground-breaking venture that combines captivating gameplay with blockchain technology, creating a unique and rewarding gaming experience....
